channel.title: Troubleshooting
channel.description: Problems with maps? Get help here!

item.title: Searching for a Map
item.author: invalid@example.com (jambe)
item.dc:creator: jambe
item.content:encoded:
I picked up the Unreal Deal Pack when it was half-off and I've been blasting around in UT killing random downtime. I started looking for some old community maps (damnable sentimentality) and can't remember what they were called.

One in particular... a ctf map with a two-level cylindrical "low gravity" chamber in the center connecting the two bases which were basically double-level loops with a ramp or two on the bottom level and a wee elevator to get to the second level (part of it had a...

Searching for a Map

item.title: what the heck is a General protection fault!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Madd_Cracker)
item.dc:creator: Madd_Cracker
item.content:encoded:
I have been using ued3 for a while now and for some unknown reason the error message below has been coming up recently. I tried reinstalling ut2k4 but didn't help. I've been using ued since ut1 and have never seen this error before could someone help me out?


the evil message....

Build UT2004_Build_[2004-03-03_02.42]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 2398 MHz with 511MB RAM
Video: ALL-IN-WONDER 9600 SERIES (Omega 2.5.97a) (6497)...

what the heck is a General protection fault!

item.title: Crypt.Mask
item.author: invalid@example.com (KurtonTheMagician)
item.dc:creator: KurtonTheMagician
item.content:encoded:
Okay, Unreal Tournament has suddenly decided that it doesn't want to find the Crypt texture package. Now I can't open any maps with that package in them.

I have replaced the file, reinstalled the game twice, and it still refuses to work. Which I find odd, since I have done nothing at all in the way of editing it.

Is there a solution?

item.title: Ribeira Textures
item.author: invalid@example.com (retroman2025)
item.dc:creator: retroman2025
item.content:encoded: Does anyone know where to acquire the Ribeira textures for NYA maps by Miguel Paredes? His site is no longer available. I've searched the internet and can't find them. " Can anyone help?

item.title: zoning troubles (UT99)
item.author: invalid@example.com (flmg.tstcls)
item.dc:creator: flmg.tstcls
item.content:encoded:
To get zone locations you simply add a zone info, or water, lava, ect to a zone and edit the zone location string to what you want the zone to be called in game, correct?

The above methode has worked for me previously in other maps, but right now it's not working...

looks as though UED sees the different zones, and I don't know what else to try.

item.title: Error while claiming UT3 maps.
item.author: invalid@example.com (nawrot)
item.dc:creator: nawrot
item.content:encoded:
I am getting this:

"Error: Please select a specific gametype, not a game."

Map Title: DM-Judith
Zip Filename: DM-1on1-Judith-NAW-v120.zip
Gametype: UT3-DM

In both browsers: Firefox and Opera.

Also same error for other maps i uploaded (they all have same zip file naming convention). And files are on ftp.

I submitted 2 of my maps before crash without problems, but my login was lost, also there are small improvements (like making map name redirect friendly)

Edit: how long unclaimed maps...

Error while claiming UT3 maps.

item.title: AirfightUT Alpha 7 / v3.1a7
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded:
If you have found a way to find the newest Monster Hunt patch through downloading them directly from online servers or somehow getting the USkaarj UT99 Edition download to work, here's something you probably won't find.

I'm looking for the Airfight UT patch 3.1a7 which contains fixes AND the avilability for the gametype Air Race. Problem is, it's almost nonexistent since the only reference for it, a BROKEN link in the AirfightUT forums, won't give you anything. Was anyone lucky enough...

AirfightUT Alpha 7 / v3.1a7

item.title: MyLevel Package is gone|HELP PLEASE!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Larkin)
item.dc:creator: Larkin
item.content:encoded: When I open up UnrealED2 and start a new map there's no mylevel package. where did it go? I know it used to be there. What could be wrong? I hope, I don't have to reinstall UT. HELP PLEASE!

item.title: Neading HELP, 2D-Deck16
item.author: invalid@example.com (SCRIPT10000)
item.dc:creator: SCRIPT10000
item.content:encoded:
I have just find this big project, it calls 2D-Deck16. It is a map for Unreal I that is played like a 2d game. I want convert this to Unreal Tournament. The map is easy to convert, the problem is the *.u file that I cant convert to ut.. So I am searching for people that know how to convert this kind of files.

Thanks in advance.

URL to map: http://data.paginas.sapo.pt/Files/ut/2ddeck16.zip

item.dc:creator: themastercorey
item.content:encoded:
I want to turn a recorde demo file (DEM) into a a file that everone can watch. A
mod file for example. Now I was wondering how because I can't find any other program besides UT that can open it.

plz help. Thnx in advanced

item.title: Spinning Manta Bug.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ethier)
item.dc:creator: ethier
item.content:encoded: Some of the mantas in quite a few maps have a strange bug. They cannot be steered and will only spin in circles. Does anyone know why this is? I speculate that there are at least two types of mantas that can be placed in UED, a good one and a faulty one. I can't test this theory because I can't use the editor. Is this just me?

item.title: 2k4 maps in 2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (=IRON=CORAX)
item.dc:creator: =IRON=CORAX
item.content:encoded:
Hello, I'm new here, so first of all I would like to apologize for making this thread if there is a similar to this one, but unfortunately I haven't found any.

TheSpoonDog said:
This is the 2003-compatible version of CTF-Deep from the Community Bonus Pack 2. It was built primarily for UT2003 and used no UT2004 content, so why not?
Click to expand...
Here is my problem: once upon a time I discovered there is a CTF map called 'Deep' from the CBP map pack for UT2004. Later I was glad to find...

2k4 maps in 2k3

item.title: .u files,no idea..
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cyrsss Female Dog)
item.dc:creator: Cyrsss Female Dog
item.content:encoded:
I have downloaded .u files,online Multiplaying,with the cached maps.

I run CacheManager and the .u files end up in UT/System.

How is it and please could you tell how to run the .u files?

I ask because I have the BBST or Zark sniper rifle .u files but they don't appear in the Mutators list in-game.Also I have many many many new SGirl-type skin .u files and have no idea how to add those to Player config.

I not code,so have no working-knowledge of these files.

item.title: Nali games
item.author: invalid@example.com (veselyt)
item.dc:creator: veselyt
item.content:encoded: Perhaps some of you have this mod working, but I don't. I have installed the umod file, but when trying to run the game, there is a problem: there should be 2 mods in the nali games cathegory, but I can see only 1 on my screen. Furthermore, when I try to run this only mod, UT crashes. Any ideas?

item.title: Downloading problem: Can't find file for package 'HourAdara'
item.author: invalid@example.com ({RoD}JaDeN)
item.dc:creator: {RoD}JaDeN
item.content:encoded:
I have finish my first map and hosted it on FileFront. A friend of mine downloaded it but recieved this critical error.

UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2005-02-15_17.02]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 2535 MHz with 767MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce4 MX 4000 (7777)

Failed to enter C:\UT2004\Maps\DM-RoDHyperDrift.ut2: Can't find file for package 'HourAdara'

History: UGameEngine::Init <- InitEngine <- FMallocWindows::Free <-...
Click to expand...
Downloading problem: Can't find file for package 'HourAdara'

item.title: Missing an CTF map
item.author: invalid@example.com (wattstone)
item.dc:creator: wattstone
item.content:encoded:
Hi, i am looking for a map that i lost when change my computer, this map its like the famous CTF-FACE. Two bases floating in the space, but this one have two solar panels in the middle of the map, just like a satelite. I belive that the bases are higher than face. The redeemer is located under the base. You can shot it from a closed room, there is a small passage in this room that you can use to shoot the redeemer. Another thing about this map is that have descriptions near the teleports...

Missing an CTF map
